title: [Carousel Court, Roundabout Way]
description: A pattern of boxes marked in chalk covers the scuffed roadway, hinting at spritied and frequent games of hopscotch.  A streetlamp flickers fitfully on the corner, dimly illuminating the area.

A pattern of boxes marked in chalk covers the scuffed roadway, hinting at spritied and frequent games of hopscotch.  A streetlamp flickers fitfully on the corner, failing in its attempt to add further light to the brilliant day.
